replyContent: you know At the ‚Äòend‚Äô it turns out you can start over and play again and it‚Äôs different! If you need any help with the puzzles, you can send us a screenshot to our twitter @CottonStudio, and we will give you some instructions.

content: Great game
Good game
Wonderful game. The graphics, puzzles, sound and atmosphere are great. You will not regret purchasing this game.
Masterpiece

Cotton Games are for acquired tastes only. They are on the harder side. The hints are pretty lousy so you may need to consult a walkthrough. What stands out is the very loose storyline and graphics. Anything and everything is acceptable, and thd puzzles are no exception. Rates average due to 1) lack of logic in puzzles sometimes and 2) bad hints and 3) no real coherent storyline or contributing characters.
Fantastic Delivery! My favorite of the trilogy puzzle wise
Refunded - won't pay for hints straight after paying for the game. Needed hints pretty much from the beginning and the free item hints weren't doing any good.

Good game...I finally finished after saving locally. When restarting game after saving on google play, 'continue' was greyed out and my only option was to start a new game. My overlaid notes, ironically, were still there. Anyways, a good game once I could play it.
replyContent: When you see the greyed continue button, please restart the game and check if Google Play login is successful. If so, check if you have signed in to the same account as before. Besides, do you notice anything else happen, e.g. game shutting down unexpectedly?
